reference_image_path_and_text_pairs: Exterior shot of a tall, white lighthouse positioned at the center of the frame, standing on a rocky outcrop. text_prompt: Create an image based on the following guidance: The lighthouse should reference Image 0. The lighting and sky should be adjusted to match the description.
